@BeuwenDragon @ChazzonKe @SenMikeLee So many MAGA “theories” can be easily debunked w/simple searches
Do you just regurgitate what T & his state media tell you? Literally all he does is lie to fit his want
Not your need
It’s been proven…in court
A lot!!
Please please stop believing their BS
Look it up yourself ⬇️ https://t.co/wyGwr4VtH6
@SenMikeLee PASS THE SAVE ACT - 83% of the American People want Voter ID

@SenMikeLee ID is no problem, but you have failed to show the voters, that by showing thier ID thier ballot will NOT be tagged to that ID. The fact YOU refuse to answer this question, your intent is to track how the voters vote. It is a simple question, and you REFUSE to address the issue.
@SenMikeLee Good thing they’re not voting already

@SenMikeLee @SenateGOP Fact: Democrat? the United States Constitution Law Amendment XV Section 1 establish “The right of citizens of the United States to vote shall not be denied or abridged by the United States or by any State…”
